channel.title: Problems with importing sounds
channel.description:
All time when I upload the sounds on workshop from BetaPublic, and testing the sounds after I subscribed them (in Beta Public) in console says:
Cannot figure out which search path sound\vo\inbound_tram\tram_01_goodmorning.wav came from. Absolute path is D:\[censured]\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\362890\792376435\inbound tram.vpk\sound\vo\inbound_tram\tram_01_goodmorning.wav
or
Failed to load sound "vo\inbound_tram\tram_01_goodmorning.wav", file probably missing from disk/repository
Any ideea if is from Beta Public?

item.title: Problems with importing sounds
item.dc:creator: The_Guardian
item.description:
All time when I upload the sounds on workshop from BetaPublic, and testing the sounds after I subscribed them (in Beta Public) in console says:

Cannot figure out which search path sound\vo\inbound_tram\tram_01_goodmorning.wav came from. Absolute path is D:[censured]\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\362890\792376435\inbound tram.vpk\sound\vo\inbound_tram\tram_01_goodmorning.wav

Failed to load sound “vo\inbound_tram\tram_01_goodmorning.wav”, file probably missing from disk/repository
